document.title: Upper Jaw Braces Treatment
document.summary: Kate's treatment involves using traditional braces to address the alignment of her upper teeth. The expected duration for this moderate case is approximately 7–10 months. A mixed monitoring approach will be utilized, combining both in-office visits and remote assessments to ensure optimal progress. Some attachments may be used to assist with specific tooth movements during the course of treatment. Whitening is not included in this plan.
next_steps: Schedule initial appointment for brace placement
Discuss monitoring schedule with the orthodontist
